column2: Ali bolnik prejema furosemid ali torasemid zaradi hipostatskega edema gležnjev brez srčnega popuščanja?
column3: Is the patient taking furosemid or torasemid for dependent ankle edema without heart failure?

column3: Is the patient receiving dipyridamole as monotherapy for cardiovascular secondary prevention?

column3: Is this the first, uncomplicated venuous thrombosis?

column3: Is the anticoagulant therapy longer than 6 months?

column3: Is the anticoagulant therapy longer than 12 months?

column3: Systemic corticosteroids: is this a maintenance therapy for CPOD?

column3: Is the treatment with NSAIDs longer than 3 months?

column3: Is the patient taking NSAIDs for mild joint pain in osteoarthrosis?

column3: Systemic corticosteroids: is this a monotherapy for rheumatoid arthritis or osteoarthrosis?

column3: Do contraindications for allopurinol exist?

column3: Does the patient still have uterus?

column3: Strong opioid: is this first line treatment in mild to moderate pain?

column3: Is the patient taking laxative?

column3: Are contraindications for warfarin present?

column3: Is life expectancy longer than 5 years?

column3: Is there an idiopathic Parkinson disease?

column3: Is there a functional impairment present in the patient due to Parkinson's disease?

column2: Ali bolnik kadi?
column3: Is the patient smoking?

column2: Ali gre za duplikacijo (podvojitev)?
column3: Is this a duplicate drug class prescription?
Has the treatment with first generation antihistamine lasted longer than 1 week?

column3: Does the patient have a symptomatic diverticular disease?

column3: Does the patient take fibre supplement?

column3: Is the systolic ventricular function normal?

column3: Are there heart rhythm anomalies present like bradicardia <50 or type II or complete heart block?

column3: Is this the first-line therapy for supraventricular tachyarrhytmia?

column3: Is loop diuretic hypertension therapy?

column3: The patient is taking centrally acting antihypertensive drug. Has there been clear evidence of intolerance of other antihypertensives or are they uneffective?

column2: Ali je bolnik v zadnjih šestih mesecih imel kontrolo kalija?
column3: Has the patient had potassium monitored within the last six months?

column3: Is the tricyclic antidepressant the first drug to treat depression in this patient?

column3: Has the patient taken benzodiazepines longer than 4 weeks?

column3: Is the patient taking anticholinergic drug to counter the extrapyramidal effects of neuroleptics?

column3: Does the patient have behavioural and psychological symptoms of dementia (BPSD)?

column3: Has the patient had recurrent unexplained syncopes?

column3: Is the phenotiazine first-line treatment?

column3: Is the patient's blood pressure consistently above 140/90?

column3: Is the patient in end-of-life care?

column3: Is this mild to moderate Alzheimer's dementia or Lewy body dementia?

column3: Is there an iron deficiency present?

column3: Has the patient had a fragility fracture?

column3: Was the bone density score T below -2.5 in multiple sites?

column3: Are there contraindications against bisphosphonates, denosumab, teriparatide or strontium ranelate for treatment of osteoporosis?

column3: Is there a proteinuria or microalbuminuria present?

column3: Is the pain well controlled?

column3: Has the patient been vaccinated against influenza in the last year?

column3: Has the patient been vaccinated against pneumococcus at least once?

column3: Is the daily iron dose greater than 200mg of elementary iron?
